website_summaries.verdict: A durable, well-made steamer basket by Instant Pot with few concerns and many satisfied owners. A good choice for anyone who wants to stick with genuine Instant Pot accessories.
pros: Versatile design by Instant Pot with raised legs that keep food elevated from the water
"Smart Lift" handle is strong and makes removing the basket from the unit simple
cons: This basket fits both 6- and 8-quart Instant Pots, but the trade-off is that it doesn't maximize the cook space when used in 8-quart units

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty and Won't Trap Bacteria
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sturdy mesh strainer for my 6 QT Instant Pot that didn't have silicone feet or handle. Why? Because food particles can get trapped easily between the silicone and the metal, making cleaning a chore, or worse, causing health problems. This one is strong enough not to bend or dent and is minus the silicone. I use it to quickly steam potatoes, carrots, cauliflower, green beans, etc. in my Instant Pot. After removing the veggies, I quickly rinse the steamer and there is no food buildup. Okay, once I let it sit too long, but after a go in dishwasher, it came out shiny clean.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming, draining, and it fits the 6qt Instant Pot perfectly
customer_reviews.text: What a great all-round utensil for the Instant Pot. It arrived early and in pristine condition - thank you Prime! This is my go-to accessory for steaming - especially odd sized and over sized vegetables. And, i easily holds 1 to 18 eggs for cooking.. When it is not being used in the Instant Pot, it also is an excellent cullender. Great kitchen accessory! I chose this over a perforated insert, for its lightness, durability and ease of cleaning. Good purchase for any kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: wudbuchr

customer_reviews.title: Not as in the photo
customer_reviews.text: It is not as fine or as big as it looks in the photo. It has the wire consistency of a regular colander. It works with legumes, but I doubt it will hold finer ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Pavic

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite IP accessories.
customer_reviews.text: One of my 2 favorite instant pot accessories. I use this for all kinds of foods and I really like using these for "boiling" eggs (family of 6, so at least 12 eggs each time). Glad I bought this rather than an egg trivet because it's much more versatile and is it's own trivet.
customer_reviews.author: VanessaF

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a handy little basket , and has a better, sturdier quality than others , I am sure, and lifts the vegetables off the bottom of the pot better then the trivet of course. However, it takes up quite a bit of space in the pot and one cannot put in as many vegetables or things to steam; I understand there needs to be a gap for circulation, but this is a bit extreme, whereas without the basket and just using the trivet, my vegetables steam the same and I can add much more. It really just depends on how much you want to steam at one time.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to scrub
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great. The only thing that I have a hard time with is the cleaning of this product, especially with homemade chicken and bone broths. Everything gets pretty stuck and at the time of purchase we didn't have a dishwasher. If you have a dishwasher, it is much more manageable but will still need a large amount of scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Small size is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Small size was perfect for my 6-quart Instant pot duo! I bought the pressure cooker and then realized that I had nothing to cook the veggies in so I ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: MaxwellTurek

customer_reviews.title: Great for Veggies.
customer_reviews.text: I find that i am eating a lot more green leaf veggies since I purchased the steam-basket for my Instant Pot. Examples: Broccoli, spinach, brussels sprouts, & chopped cabbage. Sooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, study, perfect for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I found this basket to be a beautiful design, the perfect capacity, easy to use and easy to clean. I use it to steam vegetables in the Instant Pot -- highly recommend this. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great Instant Pot Addition
customer_reviews.text: The first time I cooked a seafood boil in my Instant Pot I figured a basket would be good for that. Now I can also stream potatoes and vegetables, and remove them from the Instant Pot with ease. Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Williams III

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer basket
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought to help me steam fruits and veggies to make baby food. Works well, cleans up great in the dishwasher and holds a good amount of food. The handle does get hot but I just use a pot holder like I would for the bowl insert anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because the basket with the Instantpot was chipping
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate that the instant pot basket is faulty and chipping. I wish it would have come with this basket to begin with. I got rid of the other one and this has been great for the air fryer function.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to use than collapsible steamer equipment. Even if you feel you have to use tongs to lift the handle, it is easy to pick up and remove. Stainless steel is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Beebee

customer_reviews.title: Effective and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, it's worked quite well for potatoes and various vegetables. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd g.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky rice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this piece mainly to make steamed sticky rice. The mesh is fine enough that the damp rice stays put before it starts cooking. Unfortunately that same finer mesh benefit is a pain to clean when making sticky rice. It's a breeze for other things like vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Java Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Awesome Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Great pot. Easy to clean, easy to use, can fit a whole chicken in here and easilh remove without scratching Instapot
customer_reviews.author: IThero30

customer_reviews.title: Works great in 6 qt instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my 6qt instant pot! I love it’s handle and sturdiness! Super easy to clean by turning upside down and using sprayer and then air drying. I haven’t placed in the dishwasher but it’s probably dishwasher safe. Works perfectly to steam items!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it for fish so far but am quite pleased. Quality made, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: olddad

customer_reviews.title: Fits the 6 quart Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.text: This basket fits the 6 quart Instant Pot like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: R. WiseTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to clean than other steamers I’ve had! Perfect Instant Pot accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Vix

customer_reviews.title: Great for crab legs!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used as much as I would like but I am very happy with this thus far. I used to steam crab legs in the IP.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift, good as far as she told me
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to use for Instant pot and even just for draining ingredients but overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes hard to get small pieces of food cleaned out but does what it was intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I use my Instant Pot constantly and this is an ideal way to expand its use. It does more than steam vegetables. It makes boiling eggs a snap, steaming brown bread perfect, and many other things.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality seemed good but the measurements listed were misleading. The height provided is with the handle up. It is not the actual height of the basket. I was expecting and needing something taller. So I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tennille M Green

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have the 6 quart Ultra instant Pot and this basket works great. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Would & Wii buy again
customer_reviews.text: Built better than I had expected vert sturdy In the instant pot or in a pan on the stove So versatile can do 2 dozen eggs in the IP
customer_reviews.author: Mark Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my 3 quart Instapot! Pressurized cover will not fit in pot with this basket. Great for a strainer though.
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Duo Nova.  Lid will not close with this steamer basket.
customer_reviews.text: Can't use this product with my Duo Nova Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Borges

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We use it a couple of times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer basket
customer_reviews.text: The basket fits the 8qt pot nicely and the handle is easy to use. Overall the basket does what you’d expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Love it’s stainless steel. For 6 qt IP
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe, this is a great accessory for instant pot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect! Easy pick up and clean. You will not regret getting it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the instant pot- easy to use and exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Nepz

customer_reviews.title: It works, but very difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: There were raving reviews for this steamer pot. I spent forever trying to pick one and went based solely on reviews. I didn't have a lot of money so I'm definitely aggravated with how disappointing it is. Yes it's easy to get in and out but holy clear it is a pain to clean. Stuff gets stuck in those tiny miniscule holes. It's not fun to scrub for an eternity. Dishwasher, nope... Soaking, nope. Just scrubbing. It sucks to clean. I don't even want to use it, I'm so sad about it. I think the silicone I've would probably be the easier one to clean. That's probably what I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RennLaRoux

customer_reviews.title: Invincible Pool Filter Basket
customer_reviews.text: The Hayward pool filter baskets crack over time and like all pool products, are way over priced to replace. Another Amazon review suggested I use the Instant Pot basket and I bought a generic one and yep the basket frame cracked because it didn’t fit properly. THIS IS THE ONE, its the brand name version and it’s super well made. The basket is a bit narrower to ensure it fits and it’s suspended by a nice flat lip. Buy this Stainless Steel one for the price of a pool stores’ plastic one and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristahn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stainless steel steamer basket
customer_reviews.text: The construction an quality of the solid stainless steel steamer basket was what i was expecting an delivered. I would highly recommend this steamer basket if your looking for solid stainless steel an not plastic or Teflon steamer basket. Sadly i could not give it 5 stars for easy to clean considering how finely meshed the basket is i can foresee it being a pain to wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: JIm

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe necessity for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that nearly all of the recipes in the Instant Pot book required a strainer, and this was slightly more expensive and fastest shipping (only one with shipping in under 2 weeks, but it actually arrived in less than 24 hours). It has worked well so far, and is harder than I expected to clean so I am very thankful that it is dishwasher safe,
customer_reviews.author: Keeka

customer_reviews.title: Properly durable
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the off-brand one I handled at a friend’s house, this one is solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works but could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: This could be bigger. The fit is ok but does not take advantage of the pot size it fits into. Useful for steaming, pasta into boiling water, boiling potatoes, and more. Seems well built. I expect it to last as long as the appliance.
customer_reviews.author: DocHolliday

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought the basket to cook our potatoes in. Once the potatoes are done cooking, I simply remove the basket from my Instant Pot and they are drained. Couldn't be easier! I now use it with many other vegetables. Great addition to my Instant Pot accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Teachpre

customer_reviews.title: Little extra work to clean
customer_reviews.text: Little bit extra work to clean, but nice adding functionality to my InstaPot.
customer_reviews.author: brystler

customer_reviews.title: Name brand and Perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the original name brand basket, made by Instant Pot. It’s perfect; I use this for everything. Throw it the dishwasher when done. Couldn’t be easier. Never use the trivet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cocco

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but it's very well made and fits perfectly in my Emreal 8 qt pressure fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described. The small feet on the bottom help keep my veggies about the broth. It is easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my instant pot... works great for potatoes, corn, etc. dishwasher safe...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O'neill Alves

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Such a handy strainer/basket. Going to order another and retire two colanders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a bunch of times and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tinalind

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but worked great and fits my Instapot just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Orlandi

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Initially purchased for my Instant Pot, but found lots more uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

product_meta.title: Instant Pot Official Large Mesh Steamer Basket, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:LargeThis versatile steamer basket is an Instant Pot pressure cooker essential accessory! Steam healthy, nutritious foods in your Instant Pot using this official large mesh steamer basket, specially designed for use in Instant Pot pressure cookers. This tall steamer features raised feet to protect food from boiling water while cooking. Use for steaming fish, long vegetables like corn on the cob, asparagus & more in your Instant Pot. The large mesh steamer basket is designed to nest and stack with the small mesh steamer basket, meaning you can make an entire healthy, steamed meal in one shot when you use both together. The basket has an easy-lift handle, making it easy to lift in and out of your Instant Pot. You can also use the basket as a strainer. Made from durable, rust-resistant Stainless Steel, This steamer basket is also dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup. Compatible with 6 quart & 8 quart cookers.
feature_bullets: ENJOY DELICIOUS, NUTRITIOUS FOODS: Use for steaming all kinds of vegetables, fish & more
PROTECTS FOOD: Raised feet protect food from boiling water
SMART LIFT: Easy-lift handle allows you to safely & easily lift food from Instant Pot after cooking
DUAL-PURPOSE: Use as a steamer & as a strainer
DURABLE & SAFE: Made from durable, rust-resistant stainless steel
PERFECT FIT: Compatible with 6-quart and 8-quart cookers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars930 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
